document_data.name: Song of Healing
document_data.mainbody: '''''Song of healing''''' was a [[divine]] [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that allowed [[cleric]]s to heal others with their voice.
document_data.Effects:
When the caster uttered the [[verbal component]] of ''song of healing'', the spell's magic was guided and chosen recipients within range had their wounds partially healed.

[[Magic]]al silence bestowed upon the casting [[cleric]], or ''[[deafness]]'' inflicted upon the recipient, had no effect on the spell's curative properties.
document_data.History: The specifications of ''song of healing'' were inscribed within ''[[Wythyndle's Round Book]]'', a holy [[relic]] of the followers of [[Milil]].
document_data.Components: This spell only required verbal and [[somatic component]]s in order to be cast.
